io.neba.core.resourcemodels.metadata

Class ResourceModelStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.neba.core.resourcemodels.metadata.ResourceModelStatistics

  • public class ResourceModelStatistics
extends Object
    Represents statistical data regarding the usage of a ResourceModel. This implementation is intentionally not thread-safe, i.e. the calculations will loose accuracy in case the statics are modified concurrently. This is intended: We can give up some precision in favor of a massive performance gain, as this model is accessed hundreds of times per request, e.g. during page rendering.
    However, it is expected that the statistics still provide an accurate picture and gain precision as time passes and data accumulates.
    Author:
    Olaf Otto

      • getNumberOfMappings

        public long getNumberOfMappings()
        Returns:
        the total number of recorded subsequent resource-to-resourcemodel mappings that occurred during the mapping of this model.

      • countMappingDuration

        public ResourceModelStatistics countMappingDuration(int durationInMs)
        Adds the mapping with the duration to the statistics.
        Returns:
        this instance.

      • getAverageMappingDuration

        public double getAverageMappingDuration()
        Returns:
        the average mapping duration of all counted mappings in ms.

      • getTotalMappingDuration

        public double getTotalMappingDuration()
        Returns:
        the sum of all recorded mapping durations in ms, i.e. summed up averages of the mapping duration frequency table interval means.

      • getMappingDurationMedian

        public double getMappingDurationMedian()
        Returns:
        the median of the mapping durations based on a frequency table.

      • getMaximumMappingDuration

        public double getMaximumMappingDuration()
        Returns:
        The maximum recorded mapping duration of this resource model in ms.
